content: so sweet and pretty this pattern includes instructions for a lovely little top - and a pretty long-sleeved cardigan for a newborn baby size ~ newborn requirements ~ yarn any dk i used 46g of acrylic dk for the sleeveless top needles 4mm throughout 3 small buttons gauge 22sts over 4 / 10cm worked from the top down this pretty baby top has a matching hat available too and makes a lovely baby shower gift **to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓**
